thread.title: Police find cannabis in the woods and a sense of humor online - New Hampshire news
thread.title_full: Police find cannabis in the woods and a sense of humor online - New Hampshire news

author: boston.com
title: Police find cannabis in the woods and a sense of humor online - New Hampshire news
text:
Danbury, N.H.’s police department came into possession of someone’s “summer horticulture project” on Monday, they announced on Facebook.
FOUND.. If you get home tonight and go for a walk in the woods. And your summers horticulture project has gone and you'd...
Posted by Danbury, NH Police Department on� Monday, October 12, 2015 Related Links Medford detective who threatened driver in dash-cam video resigns Get today’s headlines right in your inbox
 The photo features what appears to be five cannabis plants on the hood of a department cruisers.
They also served up some red hot zingers to commenters protesting what they saw as a waste of police time.
They had a timely response for this concerned citizen:
They were willing to give back to the community:
They educated the public on specifics:
They were helpful:
And performed a perfect example of preventative policing:
